name: Blackjack Tutor
overview: Blackjack Tutor is a 1-player blackjack teaching game for the 8-bit Atari computer. The player competes against a computer opponent, and can choose how the computer opponent will play. The player choses how many how many decks to use from 1 to 8. The player can use 4 strategy choices, including: tens count strategy, basic strategy, no strategy, or allow the computer to play. The player can bet from $1 - 1000 at the beginning of each round. The player can receive betting strategy advice.
